content: march 2013 i ve released both charts and written directions in free pdf form enjoy designer s note about sizing you **have** to block this hat even the largest size will fit like a tight beanie until it is blocked for best results use animal fibers as in the example and block as directed stretch it over a balloon or a dinner plate really stretch it if you are using an acrylic or acrylic blend yarn consider repeating row 14-29 of the chart to ensure that you get the slouch you desire and maybe go up a needle size
